title: Provision of STP and disposalsystem may also be permissible in any development other than mentioned above
clause_text: Provision of STP and disposalsystem may also be permissible in any development other than mentioned above. The professional on record shall certify the detailed scheme for theSTP and disposal system. STP structure shall be of compact design with due approval of relevent There shall not be any foul odour around the STP area or in the ambient environment.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provision of STP and disposalsystem may also be permissible in any development other than mentioned above. The professional on record shall certify the detailed scheme for theSTP and disposal system.
